info.name: Narkhotik's cate
info.description: Use with addon new tab override to choose which site to open on every new tab (like www.google.com). My own customizable theme. Allows you to change colors and background easily. Don't hesitate to send a FeedBack.
info.additionalInfo:
If you want to use a locally-stored image as background :
1. Use "Browse..."
OR
1. Select your image
2. Drag-and-drop the image to the browser
3. Copy its URL from the address bar
4. Paste that URL in the custom background URL
